Author: reba505
Title: LORD HAVE MERCY ON US!
Body: Is this what the world has come to?!Utterly banal and filthy. My adult son ordered this game. He has free will, but I let my feelings be known. I cry for our human race; for our children.

Author: Gam Gam Family
Title: One Star
Body: Too much for a family game.  Didn't realize how across the line it would be!

Author: dare
Title: vulgar obsene x-rated
Body: a 13 yr old meth head might think it is funny, I just cringed and didn't laugh much.

Author: JJ on Amazon
Title: If you have an ounce of class, you will not like this game""
Body: If you are 18 and drunk, this game is for you, otherwise, stay clear.  I found the cards distasteful, embarrassing, and totally classless. I'm shocked and disgusted that so many people gave it high marks.  I bought it for a 22 yr. old who felt violated when she read some of the cards. I really messed up buying it as a gift!

Author: Anita G Doran
Title: It’s not really funny
Body: It’s just not very funny, compared to Relative Insanity. (Just wrote a review of that—5 stars.) The cards that are funny are also grossly filthy, and I’m no prude. I played with 4 other people, all in our 60’s, all well-educated professionals. We were trying to figure out what demographic it would appeal to. Too many of the cards were just “duh” stupid, or extremely serious. What can possibly be funny about “Child abuse” ??  I bought Relative Insanity for someone else as a requested gift. I bought CAH at the same time just because I had heard so much about it. I am sorry I wasted my money. I’ll buy Relative Insanity for our game nights, and am seriously thinking about returning CAH because it is just not that funny.

Author: Lita A.
Title: If you are looking for wholesome entertainment, keep looking.
Body: With five stars and over 30,000 reviews I thought we had a hit.It was a bust. Definitely NOT what I thought it would be.I hadn't bothered to actually read the  reviews. I know, rookie mistake.In order to play this game we would have had to edit a good percentage of the response cards due to vulgarity and inappropriateness.Of course, the box does specifically say it is a game for horrible people.  But that was a joke, right?Thanks Amazon, for having a generous return policy.  We'll stick with What Do You Meme?, Jack Box, and Exploding Kittens.

Author: N. Saenz
Title: I thought this would be better
Body: I read the reviews, and I heard people say this was so fun.  The group of people I wanted to use this with includes two teens.  One of the reviews said they took out the cards that referred to God---one was'the blood of Christ'--2 referred to Jews in an antisemitic way, the rest were about sex mostly.  Well the idea is a great one but the authors must get their heads out of the can.  I decided to through it away

Author: Lennita Kumar Mathura
Title: Used game sent
Body: Game was open before I got to open it isn't  this a new game? I am super pissed now.

Author: L Koch
Title: Totally inappropriate
Body: The only thing I recommend to do with this game is throw it in the trash where it belongs.  It should be XX rated.  The sexual innuendos go too far,  sexual abuse, beastiality, unheathy sex and much more.  My family loves board games but when we gave this a try we all reacted with thumbs down.  Should only be sold in adult book store.

Author: Leah Hyatt
Title: fell off
Body: I was really disappointed!

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Gross
Body: I didn't realize the cards were a set up to generate gross responses.  Crude.  Sophomoric.

Author: Ximena A. Railey
Title: Misleading description
Body: Offensive. Inmoral. Description does not say anything about the topics and/or language used in this game. Misleading.

Author: Sharon W.
Title: Content
Body: Purchased for a family night game. Boy was I surprised when I read a few of the cards! Talking about masturbating with my grandchildren at Christmas time is too disgusting for us!!! Should be a better description of game.

Author: Glenda Carey
Body: Bought this for a party.  It was so vulgar I sold it.

Author: Just me
Title: Disgusting
Body: I knew this may have some “iffy” content but I didn’t think it would be disgusting

Author: Vegas79
Title: Treason
Body: Will never buy another deck.A game that strives on being 'non PC'  is attempting to get in the way of protecting the American borders. Treasonous company with frivolous PC stunts.

Author: CBK
Title: I’m good
Body: Just too try hard there’s rarely funny combination and more three cards they found the most shocking/racist/random xD

Author: William F.
Title: Owners are political morons who buy property on the border to try to keep the wall from being built.
Body: It was boring.

Author: Lisa Nelski
Title: Gross
Body: Not for me. I returned the game.

Author: Sal Oliva
Title: I bought the hype of this
Body: The game don’t make any sense it was a waste of money

Author: mp
Title: Don't bother.
Body: Ask around/ read reviews FIRST. My own kids were somewhat appalled that I ordered these. I thought the could be fun. COULD BE if it wasn't so vulgar and representing the worst in our culture. When I read the reviews I realized why and requested a return. Plus, nearly everyone says this gets boring after 3 games. No need to waste money contributing to the deliquency of my own soul or society.

Author: Debbie M.
Title: One Star
Body: Repetitive cards, should have returned it but didn’t realize it till it was too late.

Author: Brain T.
Title: got this game, found it offensive & had to ...
Body: got this game,found it offensive & had to return it.OK with adult humor most of the time,but this was on verge of pornographic

Author: Karl E. Horne
Title: One Star
Body: Just a bunch of dumb cock jokes for $25

Author: kelly brooks
Title: OMG!
Body: I googled 'games to play with my teen kids' and THIS is on the top of the list?!?!? MAJOR INAPPROPRIATE!

Author: Shopping girl
Title: One Star
Body: Silly game...

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: I feel like I got a used product and I'm not sure ...
Body: Really unhappy with the way that my cards came in the mail. The box was ripped and opened when I received it. I feel like I got a used product and I'm not sure if I even received all of the cards that come with the game. I'll be returning the package since I can't even use the box anymore to store the cards.

Author: Survivor
Title: This shipment arrived with the box completely broken once you ...
Body: This shipment arrived with the box completely broken once you took the plastic wrap off. What a joke! $25 for cards with no box to hold them in!

Author: Alexis Steppling
Title: The game is great but...
Body: I just spent good money for this game because I know that it makes every party more fun, but when I opened the package, the box was falling apart and the cards went everywhere. I can always put them in a new container, but when you buy something brand new, it should be brand new and not ripped apart. Some cards are ripped too. The game is great, but that was a pretty awful way to get it.

Author: J. S.
Title: Funny, but watch out for the family
Body: I thought it would be funny, and it was, but my family hated it. They won't play it with me and think I'm twisted now.

Author: melissa
Title: Game is great but there are spots on a lot of the ...
Body: Game is great but there are spots on a lot of the cards that look like blood or rust and some of the print is rubbed off the back of several of the cards. Very disappointed for what I paid to receive something like that

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: One Star
Body: The order I received is not version 2.0. It is version 1.7.

Author: Anthony DiBiase
Title: Was just a virtually an empty box. There were ...
Body: Was just a virtually an empty box.  There were only blank cards with very few other cards included. The item was presented as you were getting the actual game, but Bam!  Empty box 📦

Author: Daniel
Title: Fail
Body: I only got 23 black cards in my set.

Author: Carmen
Title: Racism, sexism, anti-Semitism considered humorous. Gag.
Body: If I could give it a zero I would. Was told by a friend it was a fun family game. Our whole family was disgusted by the racism, anti-Semitism, sexism in what is supposed to be humorous. It’s hard to disgust all of us:  we are a family where some vote Republican and others Democrat and others have their own ideas. We are Catholics and Jews and spiritual but unaffiliated. We are liberals and conservatives. We range in age from 70 to 3. After we read the supposedly funny questions we felt like we needed a shower. The game went in the trash can.

Author: sheri
Title: One Star
Body: Package arrived empty

Author: hike sedona
Title: Apparently we are not “with” it... many ...
Body: Apparently we are not “with” it ... many of these cards would even make my beer drinking golfing buddies say this is not appropriate.

Author: Sylvia Hull
Title: Enjoyed it playing it so much I wanted a deck ...
Body: This seems to be an updated version of the one I played many times several years ago. Enjoyed it playing it so much I wanted a deck for myself. However, this one contained many obscene cards that I was deeply embarrassed when I introduced it at a party I recently held. I had no idea these cards were part of the deck and was mortified when one was selected by one of my guests.  I know these cards were not a part of the previous deck I played with. Why was it necessary to add these tasteless questions? I am not a prude and enjoyed the deck I played with before and the occasional 'suggestive' questions. But these went way over the line. Very disappointed.

Author: Allie Johnson
Title: Made and played by satan's biggest fans.
Body: One star is too much to give to such a dispicable game where 'coat hanger abortions' are used as a joke. Truely evil and beyond discusting. I can't believe people play this.

Author: Kelly Mcateer
Title: No stars
Body: Received an EMPTY BOX very upset

Author: IA
Title: I'm a horrible person that can find funner games
Body: I'm not a prude, I would enjoy a sick game like this but it gets redundant fast.  We played it twice with 2 different groups and it was already getting old.  I sold it for $10  I wouldnt spend $25 on it if I had it to do over again.  We like Balderdash much better and it has much more starting power.

Author: Kenneth B.
Title: One Star
Body: Great concept. To vulgar for me

Author: Anthony J. Biller
Title: If you like crude porno and diarrhea humor
Body: If you like crude porno and diarrhea humor, you'll love this game.  If not, don't buy.  It's popularity is a sad testament to our current state of affairs ...

Author: ROGER
Title: Written for men and definitely no kids should be involved with this.
Body: Should of read the reviews before buying.  Had hoped it would be fun for everyone but found it offensive and disgusting.  Do not understand why you could not make it funny and interesting without discussing rectal penetration, etc.  Very offensive to this old lady but the men love the game.

Author: Jody Parrish
Title: Dumbest game ever
Body: This was  a waist of my money,  worse game I've ever played! Had 6 people over and everyone hated it!!

Author: Ginger M Teeney
Title: One Star
Body: Not for kids at all under the age of 21

Author: B. S. Weisswasser
Title: It is disgusting and we should ban this
Body: There are anti semitic remarks in it. Target has recently taken this game off of its shelves. There is a jew pack. It is disgusting and we should ban this.

Author: Mary Ellen Rose
Title: Horrible game
Body: Horrible game.  Part of our deteriorating culture.  And I have a rather dark twisted sense of humor but please don’t buy the products.

Author: Customer
Title: One Star
Body: Had some pretty offensive cards

Author: V. Case
Title: One Star
Body: It is filthy. Had no idea or wouldn't have made the purchase.

Author: Ada Ruiz
Title: so not funny nor entertaining
Body: what is the big deal????so not funny nor entertaining, complete waste of $25 😡

Author: pastor rich
Title: Stay Away from this so-called game
Body: Be careful, many cards are too vulgar for our group. Ok, so we're older conservative folks. In order to try the game we removed over half the answer cards, it then turned out ok, but not worth the time or eco ensue.

Author: D. B. Starge
Title: Not a game.
Body: I’m not easily offended. I’m just a proponent of games that are actually good. This is an activity that may make the simple minded laugh. Go buy an actual game instead of this absolute lack of sophistication.

Author: Alicia S.
Title: One Star
Body: These cards came bent and cut up

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: A stupid, worthless game
Body: This is the dumbest and the least entertaining game I've ever played. Yuk!

Author: Chelsea J. Thomas
Title: Horrible Quality.
Body: The game is a lot of fun but the cards came smudged and had duplicate text on them. It looks like they were printed and packaged too soon. Most of the cards are defective. Very very disappointed.....

Author: Elizabeth Lucero
Title: ... got this game because I heard a lot of great things about it but I wasn't too impressed
Body: I got this game because I heard a lot of great things about it but I wasn't too impressed. Maybe my expectations were too high. Now it's just collecting dust.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Not very fun when you have two of the same cards in ...
Body: Too many duplicayes! Not very fun when you have two of the same cards in your hand. Not much of an expansion if I already have a bunch of the cards.

Author: ShepherdWay
Title: Not for our friends
Body: First of all, this game is intended for adults. Secondly, this game involves a zero IQ with incessant sexual content that becomes lackluster within minutes. To be open minded, I shared the cards with about a dozen people (between 24-65) and censed their opinion. To my surprise, no one found it interesting. We enjoy games but this one is simply too strange.

Author: Lisi
Title: Nope-Nope-Nope
Body: This wasn't as spectacular as reviews made it seem. We played this with 30 yr olds, 20 yr olds and 18 & 19 year olds. Sure, you may get the occasional funny lines/combinations, but it wasn't continuous. We aren't serious people, we joke around, have fun, we all have a sense of humor and some of us have a dark sense of humor but this game isn't worth the hype. Unless you're drinking or, on some drug, this game is not a 'non-stop full of laughs' nights. You must be on that 'everything is so funny' mood to find this game hilarious.

Author: Ella
Title: No good
Body: Not good

Author: James A. Maslowski
Title: I bought into the pre-hype.
Body: I lost interest after new details came out.

Author: Skye
Title: One Star
Body: Some of the cards were printed hazy and others almost blank. Had to throw them away.

Author: greenerk
Title: The ultimate definition of SALACIOUSNESS""
Body: In my opinion, the apparent popularity of this game is an indication as to how low the moral standards of appropriate humor has become in America (for some).  I witnessed the game being played one night, and as a 67 yr. old retiree, I was shamed by the compromise of nominal Christians & non laughing at having to choose between 2-6 salacious alternatives. I actually couldn't distinguish Believers from non. Our relatives actually fought & gave their lives for this nation so that others could dredged down entertainment to such depravity?  Could a child ever be present during such a game while his/her parent indulge in such indecency?  I think not. Isn't this a game any decent parent would want to protect your child from. THINK ABOUT IT!

Author: Jennipher Sydenstricker
Title: Unhappy with damage
Body: My box came damaged

Author: Judy
Title: Package was empty !
Body: This item wasn’t in the package! Package was empty !

Author: Cassandra
Title: Damaged box!
Body: Love the game... box came in damaged and bent up...

Author: Aly Daher
Title: Mold?!
Body: The game itself is awesome. But when it arrived the card box was sticky and when I opened it, it had mold growing it!

Author: Heather
Title: I received a salt and pepper shaker instead of the ...
Body: I received a salt and pepper shaker instead of the game. I don’t know how that happened. Lol. I thought it was a joke package at first but sure enough, it was an empty salt and pepper grinder.

Author: Janet M. Szymanski
Title: One Star
Body: Can't really leave a product review since my bag was empty! No game was included.

Author: Piquant Delight
Title: Not fun or funny!
Body: I guess you have to have a particular sense of humor that none of my friends, nor I posses.  This game was boring and a struggle to find humor. I am the first to enjoy a good raunchy joke, but most of the player cards were just stupid and/or disgusting.

Author: Bryson
Title: One Star
Body: Junk game.

Author: Naomi English
Title: Horrible. I could not imagine playing this with anyone
Body: Horrible.  I could not imagine playing this with anyone.

Author: NM gal
Title: Inappropriate and rude
Body: I thought I would be able to play this with my granddaughters. No way. The cards are rude and crass and inappropriate. Not funny to me at all. Must be for 20something age group.  I wouldn't play this if you paid me.

Author: Jenny Bradford
Title: This game is for a very mature group, who doesn’t mind being vulgar or just having a down  rightf  dirty minded,
Body: My grandson ask for this game for Christmas for the family to play together. When we started playing, it was okay, then the most vulgar cards started appearing, that’s when I started picking up the cards and putting back in the box. I was so humiliated. I told my grandson that I was sorry, but being a Christian, I told him that, I didn’t think the game was appropriate for a 17 year old. I told him that I would get him farkel, which I had played before, he understood, and now Im buying him  farkel.

Author: Pearltrader
Title: Snarky
Body: Just a little too snarky for me.

Author: L. Turner
Title: Nope
Body: I received the set, read a stack of cards, then gave it away in a white elephant gift exchange. Unfunny

Author: Betty
Title: I thought this game would be fun. It is trashy and stupid
Body: Trashy

Author: Nikki
Title: Boring
Body: Played for ten minutes then quit

Author: Piccolina
Title: Waste of money
Body: Waste of money. I thought it was going to be this hysterical game and myself, husband, and two friends just didn't get it. We thought it was pretty stupid.

Author: Austin
Title: One Star
Body: waste of money

Author: CLS
Title: Vulgar and inappropriate
Body: I like a little naughty humor but this has way too much offensive content like child molestation.

Author: Charlene Archuleta
Title: Save your money...
Body: Thought this was a different game.  This game is not much fun and kind of corny.

Author: qua
Title: ... so negative I re- sold it to someone who liked the game
Body: It was so negative I re- sold it to someone who liked the game.

Author: Julie Chamberlain
Title: I want to return this.
Body: I purchased this kind of on an impulse as a fun and funny card game to play with family over the holiday weekend.  I should have known.  Some of these cards are extremely offensive.  Going to sell this to recoup some of my money.

Author: Abel Jones
Title: Degenerate Poison Befitting a Degenerate Culture and Nation
Body: This game is very representative of the United States and the West broadly at this juncture in history.  It is purely degenerate poison and disgusting simply for the sake of disgusting.  The people who made this game are fine representatives of their tribe which rules America and blasts constant degenerate poison into the culture via television, Hollywood, and all other forms of entertainment to even include board games, card games, and video games.  The purpose is to degrade the populace and make us a twisted and bloated caricature of what God intended us to be.  In short, the purpose is to make us into what they believe we are - disgusting animals.Just like with Hollywood and all the technologies involved in mass media, these creatures did not create anything special or unique.  They are not creative, perhaps even being incapable of creativity.  They merely use money to buy, take over, and corrupt industries created by their host culture.  They are destroyers and quite proud of that fact, even bragging about it continuously.This game is a straight rip off of Apples to Apples, only with degenerate poison in place of relatively benign pop culture references.  Nobody but degenerates should play this game (and if you partake of things such as this you will eventually become a degenerate).  It is not fit for families, children, or young people.  Only those already corrupted by degenerate popular culture and mass media (TV, Hollywood) will enjoy this game.  Certainly no Christian or moral person should purchase this game.

Author: Michael D.
Title: Way too many duplicate cards!!!
Body: So we bought this game due to the fun we've had playing it with friends.  However, we were greatly disappointed with the fact that we had way too many duplicate cards.  It was ridiculous.  We would have preferred half the cards versus getting two of everything.

Author: S. Wrigley
Title: Not for me
Body: Not what I expected. Gave it away.

Author: Chris Fisher
Title: Premium" playing cards my ass"
Body: 2/3 of the black cards were bent.  All of the cards are of poor flimsy quality and even worse printing.  Save yourself the money and print them out at home.

Author: Janet Marie
Title: Boring
Body: Boring game, after one play it was played out

Author: Shelly Simone
Title: One Star
Body: Stupid game

Author: Blaine
Title: Wow, it really is for Horrible People!
Body: I am not a horrible enough person to truly enjoy this piece of Garbage.  It is a filthy game!  As soon as I read some of the cards, I promptly returned.

Author: Mark Jolles
Title: One Star
Body: the game is terrible, not funny at all. i wish i could return it

Author: solor46
Title: One Star
Body: got this for my son upon his request, i think it's crude

Author: speck
Title: One Star
Body: Don't approve of content.

Author: Debbie S.
Title: it was worse than I expected
Body: I returned this game after I read the back of the box.  I had heard it's not for the faint at heart but even so, it was worse than I expected.

Author: Nicole
Title: One Star
Body: Some are funny, but some are highly questionable

Author: L. Waters
Title: How can 30K people be so wrong?
Body: Stupid and forced. The Mad Libs we played in elementary school were much funnier.

Body: most dissappointed in the game

Date: Platinum Plan or higher is required in order to access reviews beyond 100'.
